comment: Immutable class representing the state of a device's network.

variables.name: mNetworkIdentifier
variables.comment: non-null (i.e. instead of null it'll be an empty string) to facilitate .equals().

variables.name: mIsPrivateDnsActive
variables.comment: Indicates if this network is using DNS-over-TLS.

variables.name: mPrivateDnsServerName
variables.comment: Indicates the DNS-over-TLS server in use, if specified.

methods.name: public int getConnectionType()
methods.comment: Returns the connection type for the given NetworkState.

methods.name: public int getConnectionCost()
methods.comment: Returns the connection cost for the given NetworkState.

methods.name: public int getConnectionSubtype()
methods.comment: Returns the connection subtype for the given NetworkState.

methods.name: public boolean isPrivateDnsActive()
methods.comment: Returns boolean indicating if this network uses DNS-over-TLS.

methods.name: public String getPrivateDnsServerName()
methods.comment: Returns the DNS-over-TLS server in use, if specified.
